title: ending ranked series
body: is this a new feature?? today i logged into my account to finish my placement games just to see that riot had ended my sires due to inactivity. this is a horrible feature due to the fact that not everyone has an endless amount of time to play this game. it had only been about 24 hours since my last game played... so what is the time frame that is considered inactive and have they done this before. pls let me know if you have had this happen to you  and your thoughts on the matter

replies.body: I'm thinking this might have been some weird visual bug. The inactivity warning you saw sounds like it was the warning you'd see with decay [[**see this article**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h3q1)], which being in the rank you're currently at you wouldn't have any decay at all. If this happens again, please grab a screenshot to send over here to me, but also try to submit a bug report as well.

Happen to me also this morning, was in a 5 game series, on the last game to get gold. Logged in about 10 hours after my last game, and it just cancelled my series and said because of inactivity........

I spent all last year trying to get Gold, and this season I'm 1 win away, and they just cancel the series? Seriously wtf riot.
